ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: On my server, a sash for a HBC is pretty much an even trade. Elwyn  53 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
ygData.messageBody:
On my server, a sash for a HBC is pretty much an even trade.


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
53 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 1:58 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


CoF/TBB i say, not by much. more AC with the CoF/TBB. more HP with the
RBB/HBC. the CoF has a bit more haste but item+song is max haste anyway.
it's a close call but i doubt i will have the opportunity for the CoF
anyway. currently auctioning my sash to get money to buy an HBC. any
current figures on sash and HBC prices? i'm hearing 15k for sash and 10k
for HBC, give or take.

Shada

> Congrats on the RBB, it rocks.
> I might have the opportunity to swap mine for a CoF soon.
> What do you think is a better combo? RBB/HBC or CoF/TBB?
>
>
> Elwyn <Da`Kor>
> 53 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr
